about_the_game:
Welcome to Cluminati, a thrilling word puzzle game where you, as an Initiate, face the challenge of joining the secretive and influential Illuminati. This unique game combines the intrigue of secret societies with a challenging word puzzle spread across thirteen intense rounds of initiation.

Game Features


Dynamic Puzzle Gameplay: Each round presents you with three distinct clues to help you decipher a hidden password:

  • A synonym that shares meaning with the password.
  • A word that starts and ends with the same letters as the password.
  • A word that rhymes with the password.

Time-Pressured Challenges: As you advance through the rounds, the time allotted to solve each puzzle decreases, putting your quick thinking and linguistic skills to the test.

Hint System: You can request hints from a seasoned member of the Illuminati, but beware—each hint costs you half of your remaining time, adding a layer of strategic decision-making.

Progressive Difficulty: The passwords increase in complexity as you move closer to becoming a member of the Illuminati, ensuring a challenging and rewarding experience.

What You Can Expect:


  • Engage in a uniquely themed puzzle experience where language and logic are your key tools.
  • Encounter a challenging word puzzle that will test your vocabulary, spelling, and ability to think under pressure.
  • Experience a sense of progression and accomplishment as you solve increasingly difficult puzzles and ascend the ranks of the Illuminati.

Will your linguistic prowess and keen observation be enough to join the ranks of the Illuminati? Each success brings you closer to the inner circle, but even a single failure will bring an end to your journey. Dive into the world of Cluminati and prove that you have what it takes!
